data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Lower Dibang Valley, Arunachal Pradesh, India today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lower Dibang Valley, Arunachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Lower Dibang Valley, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.section_summary: On average, 8 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Lower Dibang Valley, Arunachal Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 39,661 who are far from you in Lower Dibang Valley, Arunachal Pradesh, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Lower Dibang Valley.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Bilaspuri people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.

Jesus, strengthen the church in Lower Dibang Valley, Arunachal Pradesh, India by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Lower Dibang Valley, Arunachal Pradesh, India to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.focus_label: Lower Dibang Valley, Arunachal Pradesh, India

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Lower Dibang Valley, Arunachal Pradesh, India a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.
